text: Nagra ete'na ome tamagesua zupa, Anumzamo'a tamagri tamavufima nazeri nagaze huzankura kore hue. Na'ankure hakaremotma korapa kumitami'a tamagu'a rukrehe osu'naze. Tamagra savri avu'avaza nehutma, monko avu'avaza nehutma, agazehu avu'avaza hu tamaga tevava nehiazankura nagrira zavite nagesa nehie.
